It’s teacher appreciation week! We would like to take a moment to honor the hard work, dedication and creativity of HPS’ amazing teachers! Due to an increasing number of student illnesses and additional confirmed cases of influenza A and B, Hillsdale Preparatory School will be closed on Thursday 1/23 and Friday 1/24 in order to take action to prevent the further spread of germs. All before and after school care, as well as any after school activities are cancelled for these days as well.
Recommendations from the Health Department with preventive actions are being sent home with your child today. Please check backpacks this afternoon for this information. In addition to those recommendations, we suggest washing student backpacks and coats, as well as wiping down school supplies such as folders, binders, books, etc.
Thank you for your continued support and understanding. Please contact Mrs. Fowler via email with any questions Annie.Fowler@hillsdaleprep.org
